tools.name: search-web
tools.description: Query the web using Linkup to access real-time knowledge and premium content, eliminating outdated data and enhancing responses with current, trusted information.
tools.instructions: Perform a web search query using Linkup. This tool is helpful for finding information on the web.
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "query": { "description": "The query to search the web with. This should be a question, no need to write in keywords.", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "query" ], "type": "object" }
